Package org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class XMLCodec

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutomatonCodec, GASCodec, GFFCodec, GFFCollectionCodec, JFFCodec, JFFNFWCodec, LogicCodec, LTL2BuchiCodec, MXCodec, OldAutomatonCodec, OldGFFCodec, SVGCodec
public abstract class XMLCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec
An XMLCodec is a codec that can encode an editable object as an XML file and decode the XML file back to the editable object.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CHARSET

      public abstract Editable fromDOM​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Decodes an XML document as an editable object.
      Parameters:
      doc - the XML document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the editable object represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if there is an error in decoding doc

    • toDOM

      Encodes an editable object as an XML document.
      Parameters:
      obj - an editable object to be encoded
      Returns:
      the XML document representing obj
      Throws:
      CodecException - if there is an error in encoding obj

    • getRootElement

      protected org.w3c.dom.Element getRootElement​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, java.lang.String tagName) throws CodecException
      Returns the root element with a specified tag name.
      Parameters:
      doc - an XML document
      tagName - the tag name of the root element
      Returns:
      the root element with tag name tagName in doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if there are more than one root elements or the root element does not have tag same as tagName
